mapper.sql: id, created_at, updated_at, cost_record_id, account_name, account_score, detail_score0, detail_score1, detail_score2, detail_score3, detail_score4, user_info_id,cost
mapper.select: select IFNULL(count(id),0) from detection_account where cost_record_id = #{recordId}
select IFNULL(count(id),0) from detection_account where user_info_id = #{user_info_id}
select IFNULL(count(id),0) from detection_account where user_info_id = #{user_info_id} and account_score >= 80
mapper.insert:
